channel.title: C++ / SDL - First Game
channel.description:
Preview of the game : -
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TuXHIpK2TAo&feature=player_embedded
Download the game [URL=http://uppit.com/v/6NAA14OV]here[/URL]. You will need to download [URL=http://www.win-rar.com/download.html]WinRAR[/URL] first.
Remember that this is our first game and we shouldn't be expected to create a master peice.
If you got any feedback on how to improve the game then please do tell us. We can add little things but won't be expanding it by much.
Thanks. Lawrie & Sp3ke.
